docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Authors
docs.text:
Name: Scott Ponte Description: Brief description about Author One, their role, interests, or background.
  • LinkedIn
  • GitHub
  • Twitter
Name: Author Two Description: Brief description about Author Two, their role, interests, or background.
  • LinkedIn
  • GitHub
  • Twitter
